name: market for water, harvested from rainwater | water, harvested from rainwater | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20779/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'water, harvested from rainwater', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;'water, harvested from rainwater'  is an inorganic substance with the CAS no. : 007732-18-5. It is called 'dihydrogen oxide'. Its molecular formula is: H2O. It is liquid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure. It is modelled as a pure substance.  There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on a consumer level. On industrial sites, the substance is used for the manufacture of products in the following sectors: irrigation, construction and mine operations.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'water, harvested from rainwater',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  water, harvested from rainwater', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/36:Water collection, treatment and supply/360:Water collection, treatment and supply/3600:Water collection, treatment and supply
